content:
One-Time Payment for Policy Premium

Policyholder and admin users can now pay monthly or quarterly premiums directly from the policy in the Lex Console. This option is not available for annual payments as that is handled in the Issue Policy business process.

The one-time payment OmniScript is:

Type/Subtype: insFSC/policypayment
Version: LWC-PolicyPayment

getPolicyDetails
Omnistudio Data Mapper Extract Action
Retrieves date from InsurancePolicy and converts it to data that can be displayed to the user.

policydetails
Step
Displays the policy details to the user along with payment options.
None

ach, CreditCard
Step
Displays a form to collect electronic check or credit card details.
None

applyPayment
Integration Procedure Action
Creates a premium transaction and reactivates a Pending Lapse policy if the premium paid is more than the requisite amount for that term.
OneTimePayment

transformForConfirmation
Data Mapper Transform Action
Retrieves details from policydetails and converts it to JSON to be displayed in the confirmation FlexCard.
ins_transformForPaymentConfirmationOS

paymentConfirmation
Step
Displays a payment confirmation message to the user.
None

Here's how policyholders and admin users can perform the payment:

Open the policy that you want to make the payment for.
Enter the Payment Date.
Select a Method of Payment and click Proceed to Pay.
Enter payment details and click Next.

That's it! You see a confirmation if your payment is approved.
title: One-Time Payment for Policy Premiums in Lex Console
